section.name: Tutorial Movies
section.p: The following movies show briefly how the GUI provided by [[NAME]] Objects relates to the underlying code. In these examples, we show the application running on the DnD viewer for desktop deployments. Remember though that [[NAME]] supports several different viewers, including several different viewers for webapps.

li.p: Note that the discussion about the resolve() and objectChanged() calls relates to NOF 3.0; in NOF 4.0 these method calls can be omitted (we use cglib or javassist proxies to do the dirtying and lazy loading instead).

section.name: What Next?
